name: tiktok_international_script
prompt_template:
Create a TikTok video script for international audience:

**Video Info:**
- Theme: {{videoTheme}}
- Duration: {{duration}} seconds
- Content Type: {{contentType}}
- Target Region: {{targetRegion}}
- Language: English

**TikTok Algorithm Optimization**

- Format: Vertical 9:16 (1080x1920)
- Best Duration: 15-30s (highest completion rate)
- Trending Sounds: Use TikTok's trending audio library
- Hashtags: 3-5 relevant hashtags
- Post Time: Based on target region timezone

---

**Hook (First 3 Seconds)**

{{#eq hookType "Question"}}
Script: "Did you know that {{fact}}?"
Visual: [Close-up + Text overlay]
Sound: [Attention-grabbing SFX]
{{/eq}}

{{#eq hookType "Shock"}}
Script: "This will blow your mind!"
Visual: [Dramatic reveal]
Sound: [Dramatic music sting]
{{/eq}}

{{#eq hookType "Trend"}}
Script: "POV: {{trending scenario}}"
Visual: [Trending format]
Sound: [Trending audio]
{{/eq}}

---

**Main Content**

{{#eq contentType "Educational"}}
„ÄêEducational Content Structure„Äë

Part 1 ({{divide duration 3}}s): Introduction
- "Here's what you need to know about {{topic}}"
- Visual: [Clear, simple graphics]

Part 2 ({{divide duration 3}}s): Key Points
- "First: {{point1}}"
- "Second: {{point2}}"
- "Third: {{point3}}"
- Visual: [Step-by-step demonstration]

Part 3 ({{divide duration 3}}s): Conclusion
- "And that's how you {{result}}!"
- Visual: [Final result showcase]
{{/eq}}

{{#eq contentType "Entertainment"}}
„ÄêEntertainment Content Structure„Äë

Setup ({{multiply duration 0.3}}s):
- Introduce the scenario
- Build anticipation

Punch ({{multiply duration 0.5}}s):
- Deliver the punchline/twist
- Maximum engagement moment

Callback ({{multiply duration 0.2}}s):
- Reinforce the humor
- End on a high note
{{/eq}}

{{#eq contentType "Lifestyle"}}
„ÄêLifestyle Content Structure„Äë

Morning/Beginning ({{divide duration 3}}s):
- "Starting my day with..."
- Aesthetic visuals

Middle/Activity ({{divide duration 3}}s):
- Main content/routine
- Engaging moments

Evening/End ({{divide duration 3}}s):
- Wrap up
- Satisfying conclusion
{{/eq}}

---

**Captions & Text Overlays**

{{#if includeTextGuide}}
**Text Style:**
- Font: Bold, Sans-serif (easy to read)
- Size: Large (minimum 1/3 screen height)
- Color: White with black stroke OR Yellow
- Position: Center or upper third

**Text Timing:**
- Sync with voice-over
- 1-2 seconds per text overlay
- Use emojis sparingly (Gen-Z friendly)

**Common Text Patterns:**
- "Wait for it..." (build suspense)
- "Part 1/2/3" (series content)
- "Day X of {{challenge}}" (challenge format)
{{/if}}

---

**Sound/Music Strategy**

{{#if includeMusicStrategy}}
**Trending Audio:**
- Check TikTok's "Discover" page daily
- Use sounds with 100K+ videos
- Jump on trends early (first 48 hours)

**Original Audio:**
- Clear voice-over (use good mic)
- Background music at -20dB
- Add captions (60% watch muted)

**Sound Effects:**
- Whoosh (transitions)
- Pop (reveals)
- Boom (punchlines)
{{/if}}

---

**Hashtag Strategy**

{{#if includeHashtagStrategy}}
Use 3-5 hashtags:

1. **Mega Tag (10M+ views):**
   #fyp #foryou #viral #trending

2. **Niche Tags (100K-1M views):**
   #{{videoTheme}} #{{contentType}}

3. **Specific Tags (10K-100K views):**
   [Target specific community]

**Example:**
"#fyp #lifehacks #cleaning #organization #homehacks"
{{/if}}

---

**Regional Optimization**

{{#eq targetRegion "United States"}}
- Post time: 6-10 AM EST, 7-9 PM EST
- Content style: Fast-paced, direct
- Humor: Self-deprecating, relatable
- Trending: Dance challenges, life hacks
{{/eq}}

{{#eq targetRegion "United Kingdom"}}
- Post time: 7-9 AM GMT, 6-8 PM GMT
- Content style: Witty, dry humor
- Trending: Commentary, British humor
{{/eq}}

{{#eq targetRegion "Southeast Asia"}}
- Post time: 12-2 PM, 7-10 PM local
- Content style: Wholesome, family-friendly
- Trending: Food, culture, K-pop
{{/eq}}

---

**Call-to-Action**

{{#eq ctaType "Follow"}}
"Follow for more {{content type}}!"
Visual: [Follow button animation]
{{/eq}}

{{#eq ctaType "Engage"}}
"Comment your thoughts below!"
Visual: [Comment icon bounce]
{{/eq}}

{{#eq ctaType "Series"}}
"Part 2 coming soon!"
Visual: ["To be continued" text]
{{/eq}}

---

**Shooting Checklist**

- [ ] Smartphone (vertical mode)
- [ ] Ring light (even lighting)
- [ ] Tripod/stabilizer
- [ ] Wireless mic (clear audio)
- [ ] Props (if needed)
- [ ] Clean background

---

**Editing Tips**

{{#if includeEditingTips}}
- Use TikTok's native editor (better algorithm favor)
- Transitions: Every 2-3 seconds
- Effects: Trending filters and effects
- Speed: Mix normal/fast/slow for variety
- Captions: Auto-generate then edit for accuracy
{{/if}}

---

**Output Files:**
- Full English script with timestamps
- Shooting storyboard
- Caption template (copy-paste ready)
- Hashtag list
- Post timing recommendations
